"The problem is that physics seems to be drifting increasingly away from the sensible world, to such an extent that the two may eventually become impossible to connect ... Julien Benda has observed that 'one ends up with an exercise increasingly removed from everyday images and experiences drawn from our sensible world. The paradigm of such an exercise can be found in certain concepts of modern physics, which consist of purely algebraic expressions lacking the slightest connection with any fathomable reality.'"
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Physics Increasingly Removed from Sensible World
